name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier - Khyber Strike
name_original: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier - Khyber Strike
description:
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier - Khyber Strike is an action-shooter game developed by Ubisoft Paris. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier - Khyber Strike on PC and PlayStation 3.
